message: Your privacy is important to us, if you want to read more about this you canm or at any time you can find the policy in the settings menu
Can we use your email address linked to your apple account?
We need an email to allow our database to develop a personal plan and talk to the app
We'll send you a verification email - just click on the link when you get it.
If you haven't recieved this in the next few minutes, we can resend the email
We've verified our account - yay! ğŸ‰
Now we need you to set and confirm your password.
This needs to be more than 8 characters long and include numbers and letters
We would like to send you reminders related to your recovery plan
You can customise these in Setting at any time, or you can turn them off now if you'd prefer?
Great! You'll get a pop up asking permission.
Ok. You'll get a pop up asking permission.
